comment.author: 47400901@N02
comment._content: May I know who was the photographer of this photo? This is my village 90 years ago...appreciate if I know the photographer..

comment.author: 31575009@N05
comment._content: According to our catalogue description, these photos were taken as part of an investigation into native health in 1936 in North Borneo by Dr. J O Shircore and the photographs were taken by Mr. G C Woolley.

comment.author: 47400901@N02
comment._content: Thanks You, Sir for the Info...Very appreciate it...:)
